reviewText: I loved this video because I love Erica Wilson's needlework designs.  The finished items which she displayed are just gorgeous!  There is also a very nice needlepoint chart included with the video.  I would recommend this video to anyone who is interested in needlepoint.

After reading the book I didn't stop my needlework for days. I highly advise this book for anyone who loves good needlework. You can email me at carl_eisenmann@shi.com if you would like to further discuss this excellent  book.
